content: Does anybody know a public v2 simulator we could use during a HL7 v2 training course? Sending some test messages to a server, and looking at the responses is a very useful thing to have as part of a training course. Transport would have to be MLLP/TCP or HTTP. Does IHE still have one online, not just for those who are preparing for a connactathon?
Gazelle should be able to support with IHE Integration profiles
